attributes.action: Petition to allow pets in social housing and housing association flats
attributes.additional_details: There are any people living in social housing that are not allowed to keep pets such as dogs and cats and other pets ,alot of these people also suffer from mental health complaints that would benefit from owning a dog , cat or other pet
attributes.background: Allow reasonable residents to own dogs ,cats and other pets in flats

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual housing providers.
